title: Random IP Generator
subtitle: Generate random IP addresses from networks and ranges with uniqueness control and seeded randomness

basicCidr.description: Generate 5 random IPs from a /24 subnet

multipleFormats.description: Multiple formats: range and CIDR with different counts

ipv6.description: IPv6 networks with various syntax formats

largeCounts.description: Large generation counts from different networks

testNetworks.description: Test networks for documentation and benchmarking

networkConfig.title: Network Configuration
networkConfig.networksTooltip: Enter networks with generation counts using various formats
networkConfig.helpText: Formats: network x count, network * count, network count, network#count, network[count]

defaultCount.label: Default Count
defaultCount.tooltip: Number of IPs to generate when count is not specified

unique.label: Unique IPs Only
unique.tooltip: Ensure all generated IPs are unique within each network

seed.label: Random Seed
seed.tooltip: Use the same seed for reproducible random results

totalIps.label: Total IPs
totalIps.tooltip: Total IP addresses generated across all networks

uniqueIps.label: Unique IPs
uniqueIps.tooltip: Number of unique IP addresses generated

allIps.title: All Generated IPs
allIps.copyAllTooltip: Copy all generated IPs to clipboard
